snippet: The plan, which is pending a vote by the Board of Governors, would replace the two-conference, six-division setup with a two-conference, four-division setup and ease travel burdens.
abstract: NHL Players’ Association announces its approval of league’s realignment proposal, which will begin in 2013-14 season pending vote by Board of Governors; plan will replace two-conference, six-division setup with two-conference, four-division setup and ease travel burdens.
lead_paragraph: The plan, which is pending a vote by the Board of Governors, would replace the two-conference, six-division setup with a two-conference, four-division setup and ease travel burdens.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Realignment Plan Gains Union’s Approval
headline.main: N.H.L. Realignment Plan Gains Union’s Approval
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Realignment Plan Gains Union’s Approval
